channel.title: Planing on Michael Healy
channel.description: Recent content in Planing on Michael Healy

item.title: Organizing and Thinking: Themes and Goals
item.description: So I’ve been thinking about how to organize and work through all of this. Both in terms of templating, as well as in terms of theming and organization. I currently have the personal stuff offset in its own subfolder, which I would either like to figure out how to place into its own subdomain, or something. I will need to figure out how to do that. There are things that I like with this Academic theme, especially in terms of it “looking” like a CV.
